Regula et Poena'dan duyabilecek 200 feet içinde bir yaratığa kutsal bir sözcük haykırırsın. Yaratık bir adet wisdom saving throw atar. Başarısız olduğu durumda yaratık iraden karşısında acı çeker ve 5d12 hasar alır, tur tekrar yaratığa her geldiğinde wisdom save'i başarılı olana kadar tekrarlar. Eğer toplamda canının yarısı kadar hasar alırsa, 1 adet dezavantajlı Constitution saving throw atar, başarısız olduğu durumda yaratık kurtulamaz şekilde paralize olur.

Harness the divine power and unleash insults upon your enemies with your holy tongue. Taunted foes must make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell DC. However, be warned that certain adversaries may persistently target you even after a successful roll.

element.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
element.description: Each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can’t willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can’t take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there’s nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.
